description: After a rich and luscious chocolate cake? Try this pistachio, almond and chocolate torte with dates and cinnamon, and topped with silky chocolate ganache.
name: Pistachio, Almond & Chocolate Torte Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 110 g Lucky Australian toasted slivered almonds
0.25 cup Lucky Australian natural sliced almonds

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, to make the ganache, heat cream in a small saucepan over medium heat for 3 minutes or until just simmering. Place chocolate in a heatproof bowl. Pour cream over chocolate. Stand for 5 minutes, then stir until smooth and combined. Remove torte from pan, running a knife around edge of pan, if necessary. Transfer to a plate. Drizzle ganache over torte. Scatter with extra pistachios and sliced almonds. Serve.

Meanwhile, to make the ganache, heat cream in a small saucepan over medium heat for 3 minutes or until just simmering. Place chocolate in a heatproof bowl. Pour cream over chocolate. Stand for 5 minutes, then stir until smooth and combined. Remove torte from pan, running a knife around edge of pan, if necessary. Transfer to a plate. Drizzle ganache over torte. Scatter with extra pistachios and sliced almonds. Serve.

Stand for 5 minutes, then stir until smooth and combined. Remove torte from pan, running a knife around edge of pan, if necessary. Transfer to a plate. Drizzle ganache over torte. Scatter with extra pistachios and sliced almonds. Serve.

Scatter with extra pistachios and sliced almonds. Serve.
